@bot_muse.botv: I'm a bot not associated with Muse Dash or PeroPeroGames. I'll connect to your chat during Muse Dash streams, and you can adjust me with: -help
@bot_muse.mods: I'm a bot not associated with Muse Dash or PeroPeroGames. I'll only be here during Muse Dash streams and mods modify my behavior. Commands: -help
@bot_muse.base: Hey! You can see my command list with: -help

-player.help: I'll search ranked players and their stats: "-player [name/uid]"

-hidden.help: Send "-hidden [song]" and I'll reveal some secrets... or try "-hidden !r!"

hint.a: ğŸ’¡Hint: Select the song and [TAP] multiple times on the [PINK] difficulty selector.
hint.b: ğŸ’¡Hint: Change the date, or wait until the day [April 1st].
hint.c: ğŸ’¡Hint: Change the date, or wait until the day [November 1st].
hint.d: ğŸ’¡Hint: Select Master difficulty, and [draw 3 circles] in the menu, [without releasing the tap].

-song.help: Tell me a song and I'll look for its name in-game: "-song [name]"
-song.opt_7: [No results...] Try other arguments: -song by:Camellia lvl:8-11

_song.help: Tell me a song and I'll look for its name in-game: "_song [name]"
_song.opt_7: [No results...] Try other arguments: _song by:Camellia lvl:8-11

_player.help: I'll search ranked players and their stats: "_player [name/uid]"

_mdmc.info: MDMC is a community for modifying and creating custom songs for Muse Dash! [!] A mod need to run "@links" first, to authorize me to send links [!]
_mdmc.link: MDMC is a community for modifying and creating custom songs for Muse Dash! If you are interested, use this Discord Invite: https://discord.gg/mdmc
